trans-unit.source: Provides encoding and decoding mechanisms for the security state using the Windows <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataProtection" name="DataProtection" href=""></xref> API functionality.
trans-unit.target: 提供编码和解码机制使用 Windows 安全状态的<xref uid="langword_csharp_DataProtection" name="DataProtection" href=""> </xref> API 功能。

trans-unit.source: This class is used for encoding the security state as represented by a *Stateful Security Context Token* when the message is sent, and for decoding the security context when the message arrives at a recipient.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于编码安全状态，由表示*有状态安全上下文令牌*发送消息，并用于解码安全上下文，当消息到达接收方。

trans-unit.source: The encoding can either be in the current user scope (whereby only processes running as the user account can decode the security state) or it can be in the local machine scope (whereby all processes running on the machine can decode the security state).
trans-unit.target: 编码可以处于 （凭此仅以用户帐户运行的进程可以解码安全状态） 的当前用户作用域，也可以是在本地计算机范围内 （凭此计算机上运行的所有进程可以都解码安全状态）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the encoding is in the current user scope.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，编码位于当前用户作用域。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the server when sending the security state in the *Stateful Security Context Token* issued to the client.
trans-unit.target: 此类由服务器在中的安全状态发送*有状态安全上下文令牌*颁发给客户端。

trans-unit.source: `DataProtection` based on the `CurrentUser` scope requires the current user to have a user profile.
trans-unit.target: `DataProtection`基于`CurrentUser`作用域要求当前用户具有用户配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If the user has a roaming profile, then the security state encoded by the user process running on one machine can be decoded by a user process running on a different machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户有漫游配置文件，然后由一台计算机上运行的用户进程编码的安全状态可以由不同的计算机上运行的用户进程解码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the current user protection scope.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否使用当前用户保护范围。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to use the current user protection scope.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否使用当前用户保护范围。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""></xref> array that specifies the entropy, which indicates additional randomness that the encoder could use to encode the security state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""> </xref>数组，它指定平均信息量指示编码器可用于编码安全状态的其他随机性。

trans-unit.source: Decodes the security state.
trans-unit.target: 将解码安全状态。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""></xref> array that represents the encoded security state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""> </xref>数组，表示编码的安全状态。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""></xref> array that represents the decoded security state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""> </xref>数组，表示已解码的安全状态。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the security state.
trans-unit.target: 将编码安全状态。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""></xref> array representing the decoded security state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""> </xref>数组，表示已解码的安全状态。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""></xref> array that represents the encoded security state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_byte" name="byte" href=""> </xref>数组，表示编码的安全状态。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the randomness of this encoder.
trans-unit.target: 指示此编码器的随机性。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte>.
trans-unit.target: 类型<xref:System.Byte>.</xref:System.Byte>的数组

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示当前<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Information returned by this method includes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.UseCurrentUserProtectionScope%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.GetEntropy%2A> values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的信息包括<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.UseCurrentUserProtectionScope%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.GetEntropy%2A>的当前实例的值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.GetEntropy%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder.UseCurrentUserProtectionScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，表示当前<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DataProtectionSecurityStateEncoder"></xref>实例。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to use the current user protection scope.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否使用当前用户保护范围。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current user protection scope will be used; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将使用当前用户保护范围;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
